siteName: Law Office of William L. Remo
siteDescription: Build the Future in the US / Buuin ang Kinabukasan sa Estados Unidos
about: I am a Filipino American attorney who grew up in the Bay Area, and I bring both personal and professional experience to my practice.

projects.about: Assisting U.S. citizens and lawful permanent residents in petitioning for relatives.
Advising and representing lawful permanent residents in the citizenship process, including USCIS interviews.
Representing clients in applications for lawful permanent residency within the U.S.
Preparing and filing motions when new facts or evidence warrant reconsideration of a prior decision.
I can assist clients in both English and Tagalog/Filipino, making the process smoother for families more comfortable in their native language.

projects.projectTitle: Ready to Represent You in Court
projects.about: Some lawyers only do paperwork. I can also represent you in front of a judge when needed.
